result.name: Identification of a novel deletion on FXN gene
result.description: We report a patient that presented the typical clinical features of FRDA and genetic analysis of FXN intron 1 led to the assumption that the patient carried the common biallelic expansion. Subsequently, parental sample testing led to the identification of a novel intragenic deletion involving the 5?UTR upstream region and exons 1 and 2 of FXN gene.
